name: Imjust a slime who wants to die
name_original: Imjust a slime who wants to die
description:
This game was made for a game jam

This was my very fisrt time doing time.overall it was a great experience

Your objective is to kill the slime you are controlling,to do this you have to fill the Death-o-meter

To launch the slime in the air just hold down iun the opposite direction in which you want to launch it.

Once you buy the jetpack in the store you will be able to controll it with the arrow keys or A & D 

Get propelled in the spikes and in the mines,to keep your score going up,as you step in them it will be easier  for you to keep aumenting your score 

Have fun and thank you for playing my game!
